title: My Daughter Seo-young
resume: My Daughter Seo-young is a 2012 South Korean television series, starring Chun Ho-jin, Lee Bo-young, Lee Sang-yoon and Park Hae-jin. The family drama focuses on the broken relationship between Seo-young and her father, who later reunite with the help of her twin brother. It aired on KBS2 from September 15, 2012 to March 3, 2013 on Saturdays and Sundays at 19:55 for 50 episodes.
